snippet: The world's largest publicly traded hedge fund firm named several executives to its GLG division, a unit that has been troubled since the Man Group acquired it for $1.6 billion in 2010.
abstract: The world's largest publicly traded hedge fund firm named several executives to its GLG division, a unit that has been troubled since the Man Group acquired it for $1.6 billion in 2010.

headline.main: Man Group Appoints Executives at Its GLG Division
